reviews.review: Basically just Portal one with more mechanics and more jokes. An absolute joy to play.

Its a first-person game that will leave you feeling "Big-Brain". What more could you ask for.
Basically two campaigns for the already extremely low price:
Multiplayer & Singleplayer
You also get to listen to a robot insult you 24/7. In normal circumstances, I'd say shield your ego, but honestly, everyone needs to experience Glados.
Just once.
funny killer robot ho died is alive AGAIN!??
this is a ripoff of portal 1
Can't say yes enough to express how much I recommend this beauty - it's a masterpiece!
Great Game! I would say this game is better with friends in the co-op, but the singleplayer is still really good!
Wheatley is very funny i love this game so much and the area's you explore are so cool and have so much attention to detail.
Literalmente esse jogo eh um teste de Qi :)

Friend goes bad
Bad goes good
Light in 50 years
Very fun and puzzly. Had to search up a few playthroughs to get through some levels, but very fun and good story
grandioso juego para personas con mas IQ :v , tambien portal 1 lo recomiendo para entender la campaña del portal 2
beğenmediğim yönü maplerin oynanışın çabuk bitmesi
man this game is so fun even after a decade since it was released
This was one of the first video games i ever played and it's so great to be able to experience it again

Игра крутая, но мало уровней в коопе.
Если друг Додик,Аут,Даун,Зоофил,Педофил и Нацист то поиграйте обязательно!

Juegazo, he jugado el primero y quedé impresionado y ahora que jugué el segundo quedé maravillado y además esperando por otro juego que sé bien que no va a salir.
10/10: Lo olvidaría para jugarlo de nuevo y disfrutarlo.
one of the best games of all time
Haven't even played it much yet and I already know it's one of the best games ever. Amazing writing, characters, gameplay, and mechanics. Anyone that hasn't played Portal 2 is seriously missing out.

Só um Portal 3 ou Half Life 3, Valve. Nunca te pedi nada
unos de mis juegos favoritos, debes de jugarlo

NIce game with tricky levels. Good for training concetration and IQ. Nice story and level design, however it was too short. 7 Hours to play through. Coop and custom maps are not in my interests. I vote only for single player story mode. In overall I recommend for halflife and portal 1 fans. Buy only in discount!

Man, after replaying this game and completing it in one sitting just now, all I have to say is this. I miss you, Valve. The good old days when you were my favorite video game company, the games you made were of an unsurpassed  quality, and just the thought of what could come next if you woke up is enough to keep me holding onto hope. This game is a 15.5/10 masterpiece, not just this game, but Portal 1, Team Fortress 2, the Half Life series and everything else Valve has done. If you're on the fence about buying this game, PLEASE DO. It is a must play, and I would give everything to experience the Portal series for the first time again. until then, I'll just keep testing. For science.
Игра отличная. Помогает найти друзей, отличная кампания и ко-оп. можно свои камеры создавать и играть в чужие, оценивать их. 5 звезд из 5

one of best games to play with a friend 

the hardest thing in this game is to have a friend to play with lol
После первой части портала, решил сразу пройти и вторую. Ну что сказать, очень часто в конце тупил и с помощью ютуба пытался до пройти. Игра стоит того чтобы ее пройти.
Головоломки среднего уровня. Хотелось что бы более сложных испытаний!!! А в целом очень даже классно!

Amazing game, 10x better than Portal 1

- Amazing Gameplay
- Amazing story, with lots of twists

Good game this is. Play it you must.

I played this game back in middle school, it was one of the first games I ever played on the Xbox 360, highly recommend it, especially for younger kids.
hsahaha puzzle game go AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA MY BRAIN HURTS

spoiler warning Wheatley is amazing but I wish he didn't turn evil he was an amazing allay. This game has better graphics then poppy playtime or "poopy playtime" a game that released in 2021 and costs money why does a demo cost money!(talking about high Elmo) but I do recommend Portal 2 its AMAZING!
one of the best games ive played
I really enjoy playing this game, personally i think this is so much better than the 1st one.

Some of my fondest gaming memories are from the era of The Orange Box. Now, many years later I've finally bought and finished Portal 2. What a great game on every aspect. At the current Winter Sale price you'd be cheating yourself not buying it. Heck, even the full price is a steal.

Великолепно. Прошёл первый раз, концовка просто 124/12, даже мурашку пустил. Эмоции она подарила больше чем Half-Life. Сам поворот, что вроде бы Уитли тебе помогает, рискует собою, ради того чтобы убить Гладос, но по итогу тупо кидает тебя ради управления комплексом. Но главный враг, ещё с первой части идёт на сделку в которой обе будут в плюсе: Гладос вернёт себе управление, а Челл она отпустит на свободу. Даже в конце признаётся что Челл была ей другом. 


-Космос такой большой, посмотреть всё 
-Я бы хотел всё вернуть, честно, я, честно хотел бы всё вернуть, вовсе не потому-что я застрял в космосе
-Я В КОСМОСЕ
-Я знаю приятель, ага, мы в космосе
-КОООООООООООСМООООООООООС
-Так или иначе если бы я её снова увидел, знаешь чтобы я сказал?
-Я в космосе
-Я бы попросил прощения, искренне, мне жаль что так вышло, я был властным монстром и мне действительно жаль
-Я В КОСМОСЕЕ
-Конец...
